          if (window.gap.buildVersion) {
            window.gap.buildVersion["sitewide-app"] = buildVersions;
          } else {

          }
        } else {
          window.gap = { buildVersion: { "sitewide-app": buildVersions } }
        }

          window.newrelic.setCustomAttribute("sitewide-app-version", buildVersions);

      if (typeof NREUM === 'object') {
        NREUM.info={beacon:"bam.nr-data.net",errorBeacon:"bam.nr-data.net",licenseKey:"a955d177f0",applicationID:"391188651",sa:1};
        newrelic.setCustomAttribute('brand', window.gap.brand);
        newrelic.setCustomAttribute('market', window.gap.market);
        newrelic.setCustomAttribute('pageType', window.gap.pageType);
        newrelic.setCustomAttribute('buildVersion', window.gap.buildVersion['category-page']);
        newrelic.setCustomAttribute('searchQuery', window.location.search);
        newrelic.setCustomAttribute('cid', window.__CATEGORY_PAGE_STATE__.cid);
        newrelic.setCustomAttribute('abSegValue', JSON.stringify(window.__CATEGORY_PAGE_STATE__.abSeg));
        newrelic.setCustomAttribute('pmcsEnabled', Boolean(window.__CATEGORY_PAGE_STATE__.enabledFeatures['cat-pmcs']));
        newrelic.setCustomAttribute('crosslinkFailure', JSON.stringify(window.__CATEGORY_PAGE_STATE__.smartCrosslinkError));
      } else {
        console.log("NREUM is undefined, this is fine if you are not viewing this app with sitewide-app included since sitewide-app adds the new relic library.")
      }
    </script>
    
        
      <script type="text/javascript" data-focus-on-hidden="true" aria-hidden="true">
        var buildVersions = {
          version: "3a1fa3f4",
          marketingUIVersion: "Version not found",desktopSearchBarVersion: "Version not found",mobileSearchBarVersion: "Version not found",megaNavVersion: "Version not found",hamburgerNavVersion: "Version not found",
        };
        if (window.gap) {
          if (window.gap.buildVersion) {
            window.gap.buildVersion["category-page"] = buildVersions;
          } else {
            window.gap.buildVersion = { "category-page": buildVersions }
          }
        } else {
          window.gap = { buildVersion: { "category-page": buildVersions } }
        }
        if (window.newrelic) {
          window.newrelic.setCustomAttribute("category-page-version", buildVersions);
        }
      </script>

fill-rule="evenodd"></path></svg></div><span>Your Browser Opt-Out Preference Is Honored</span></div><h2 id="ot-pc-title"></h2><div id="ot-pc-desc"><br></div><section class="ot-sdk-row ot-cat-grp"><h3 id="ot-category-title" aria-hidden="true"></h3><div class="ot-cat-item ot-vs-config" data-optanongroupid="SPD_BG"><!-- Group name --><h4 class="ot-cat-header" id="ot-header-id-SPD_BG">Privacy Preference Page</h4><div class="ot-tgl"><input type="checkbox" name="ot-group-id-SPD_BG" id="ot-group-id-SPD_BG" aria-checked="true" role="switch" class="category-switch-handler" data-optanongroupid="SPD_BG" checked="" aria-labelledby="ot-header-id-SPD_BG"> <label class="ot-switch" for="ot-group-id-SPD_BG"><span class="ot-switch-nob" aria-checked="false" role="switch" aria-label="Privacy Preference Page"></span> <span class="ot-label-txt">Privacy Preference Page</span></label> </div><!-- Group description --><p class="ot-category-desc" id="ot-desc-id-SPD_BG">Gap Inc. and its family of brands (Gap, Old Navy, Banana Republic, and Athleta) may share personal information with other parties to provide analytics services and serve ads on our behalf targeted to your interests and based on your online activities. Information may be linked to your browser or device (like cookies and similar tracking technologies) and related to you if you have a customer account or interact with us in other ways. These parties may use the information for their own marketing and to offer products and services on our sites and apps. <br> <br> Information is not shared for money, but certain uses may be deemed the “sale” or “sharing” of personal information under applicable privacy laws. <br> <br> You can opt-out of these uses, by taking the steps below. <span style="color:black"><strong> If you have a customer account, please sign-in first, so we can maintain your preference. </strong></span> <br> <br>    <span style="color:black"><strong>1. Slide the toggle above to the left and click "Submit"</strong></span> to stop the sharing of information linked to your browser or device. Please keep in mind that these tools are limited to the browser or device you’re using because they work off your browser ID and device ID. If you’re not signed-in or don’t have a customer account, you will need to take this step on each browser and device you use. <br> <br> You can also stop this sharing by visiting our sites with an opt-out preference enabled in your browser (like the Global Privacy Control). If enabled, we’ll display a banner that says “Your Browser Opt-Out Preference Is Honored.” <br> <br>    <span style="color:black"><strong> 2. Please then come back to this page</strong></span> and use <a href="https://privacyportal.onetrust.com/webform/e1cf9ab6-fc39-4557-b4ef-4393861dad52/5069878c-b35b-463f-a1ee-b8d846c30070" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">this webform</a> to provide information necessary to stop the sharing of other information that may be related to you.  <br> <br> Please visit our <a href="https://www.gapinc.com/en-us/consumer-privacy-policy" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Privacy Policy</a> for more on our information practices.</p></div><div class="ot-cat-item ot-vs-config" data-optanongroupid="BG160"><!-- Group name --><h4 class="ot-cat-header" id="ot-header-id-BG160"><br></h4><!-- Group description --><p class="ot-category-desc" id="ot-desc-id-BG160"></p></div><!-- Groups sections starts --><!-- Group section ends --><!-- Accordion Group section starts --><!-- Accordion Group section ends --></section></div><section id="ot-pc-lst" class="ot-hide ot-hosts-ui ot-pc-scrollbar"><div id="ot-pc-hdr"><div id="ot-lst-title"><button class="ot-link-btn back-btn-handler" aria-label="Back"><svg id="ot-back-arw" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" x="0px" y="0px" viewBox="0 0 444.531 444.531" xml:space="preserve"><title>Back Button</title><g><path fill="#656565" d="M213.13,222.409L351.88,83.653c7.05-7.043,10.567-15.657,10.567-25.841c0-10.183-3.518-18.793-10.567-25.835
